position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 1271, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1990}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Portharcourt, Nigeria', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'In this role, my purpose was:
•	Manage all WE and CWI pre-DG4 Front End Work into SPDC Land, Swamp and Shallow Offshore Projects 
•	Provide Wells Discipline Support to both SPDC and SNEPCO Wells organization.  The Discipline Support includes: Process safety and Standards support, Technology support, IT Application support, Waste Management support,  Materials support, QAQC capability, moveables and ER support.   
•	Discipline Support also includes overseeing the health and status of the entire Wells Capability (training, succession planning etc.) 
•	As TA1 for Well Engineering, provide technical assurance (working with global discipline support) for all wells projects, develop and manage the process for technical challenge, out-of-the-box thinking, new ideas, evaluation of well concepts and models, investigation of opportunities to improve the project economics and technical robustness
•	Manage the interface and relationship with WE Contractors to protect delivery.  Manage contractors through Contract Owner and Holder roles
•	Support relationship management with NAPIMS, NCDMB and CoV to support execution of business plans    
•	Support Goal Zero delivery in all Wells Operations

My key accountabilities are:
•	Pre-DG4 Wells input in all SPDC projects
•	Capability management of staff
•	Discipline support to all WE and CWI activities
•	Pre-DG4 support to annual spend: $600mln to $800mln (100%) between 2018 and 2020.
•	5 direct reports and accountable for 50+ staff and overseeing 150+ Shell well engineers from a capability point of view 
•	Managing over 30 active development and 19 exploration HPHT pre DG3 projects with an approx.  $800mln CAPEX in portfolio
•	Front End Engineering for over 170 wells spanning Land, Swamp and Shallow Water Offshore
•	Managing 6 Work streams for Rigless/workover Units carrying out OPEX activities
•	Developing Reserves of 100-200 MM Bbls with potentials of 350 - 500  MBOEPD Addition (average in next 3 years - Contributory)', 'title': 'Wells Engineering Discipline Manager', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Rivers, Nigeria', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Expertise Holder for all Well Engineering Designs and Operations.
